[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 1002003 - Statement - État du résultat global, résultat net, charges par fonction (Statement) but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ShareOfProfitLossOfAssociatesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod, ifrs-full:ProfitLossFromOperatingActivities, ifrs-full:IncomeTaxExpenseContinuingOperations, ifrs-full:ProfitLoss, ifrs-full:Revenue, ubisoft:Autresproduitsoperationnelsnoncourants, ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, ubisoft:Autreschargesoperationnellesnoncourantes, ifrs-full:CostOfSales All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 1001002 - Statement - État de la situation financière, courant/non courant (Statement) but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:OtherCurrentAssets, ifrs-full:InvestmentsInAssociatesAccountedForUsingEquityMethod, ifrs-full:CurrentBorrowingsAndCurrentPortionOfNoncurrentBorrowings, ifrs-full:EquityAttributableToOwnersOfParent, ifrs-full:DeferredTaxLiabilities, ifrs-full:SharePremium, ifrs-full:OtherNoncurrentFinancialLiabilities, ifrs-full:NoncurrentAssets, ifrs-full:Assets, ifrs-full:PropertyPlantAndEquipment, ubisoft:Resultatconsolide, ifrs-full:OtherCurrentLiabilities, ifrs-full:CurrentTaxLiabilitiesCurrent, ifrs-full:TradeAndOtherCurrentPayablesToTradeSuppliers, ifrs-full:CurrentFinancialAssets, ifrs-full:CurrentAssets, ifrs-full:NoncurrentProvisionsForEmployeeBenefits, ifrs-full:LongtermBorrowings, ifrs-full:CurrentTradeReceivables, ifrs-full:CurrentLiabilities, ifrs-full:IntangibleAssetsOtherThanGoodwill, ifrs-full:DeferredTaxAssets, ifrs-full:OtherLongtermProvisions, ubisoft:Reservesconsolidees, ifrs-full:Equity, ifrs-full:CurrentTaxAssetsCurrent, ifrs-full:NoncurrentLiabilities, ifrs-full:EquityAndLiabilities, ifrs-full:NoncontrollingInterests, ifrs-full:Inventories, ifrs-full:NoncurrentFinancialAssets, ifrs-full:CashAndCashEquivalents, ifrs-full:IssuedCapital, ifrs-full:Goodwill, ubisoft:Actifsfinancierdegestiondetresorerie, ifrs-full:RightofuseAssetsThatDoNotMeetDefinitionOfInvestmentProperty All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 1001002 - Statement - État de la situation financière, courant/non courant (Statement) includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ubisoft:Coutdelendettementfinanciernet of 17,400,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is -17,300,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -5. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-04-01 to 2021-03-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ubisoft:Coutdelendettementfinanciernet that should add to 17,400,000 are comprised of the following:
- InterestExpense 18,400,000 + InterestIncomeOnCashAndCashEquivalents 1,100,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 1001002 - Statement - État de la situation financière, courant/non courant (Statement). If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ubisoft:Coutdelendettementfinanciernet Total Value : 17,400,000 Total period : 2020-04-01 to 2021-03-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -5 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/969500I7C8V1LBIMSM05/2021-03-31/ESEF/FR/0/ubisoft-2021-03-31AR.zip/ubisoft-2021-03-31AR/reports/ubisoft-2021-03-31AR.xhtml 158695
